trans-unit.source: Locate your virtual network gateway and click **All settings** to open the **Settings** blade.
trans-unit.target: Locate your virtual network gateway and click **All settings** to open the **Settings** blade.

trans-unit.source: On the **Settings** blade, click **Connections**, and then click **Add** at the top of the blade to open the **Add connection** blade.
trans-unit.target: On the **Settings** blade, click **Connections**, and then click **Add** at the top of the blade to open the **Add connection** blade.

trans-unit.source: On the **Add connection** blade, **Name** your connection.
trans-unit.target: On the **Add connection** blade, **Name** your connection.

trans-unit.source: For **Virtual network gateway**, the value is fixed because you are connecting from this gateway.
trans-unit.target: For **Virtual network gateway**, the value is fixed because you are connecting from this gateway.

trans-unit.source: For **Local network gateway**, click **Choose a local network gateway** and select the local network gateway that you want to use.
trans-unit.target: For **Local network gateway**, click **Choose a local network gateway** and select the local network gateway that you want to use.

trans-unit.source: For **Shared Key**, the value here must match the value that you are using for your local VPN device.
trans-unit.target: For **Shared Key**, the value here must match the value that you are using for your local VPN device.

trans-unit.source: If your VPN device on your local network doesn't provide a shared key, you can make one up and input it here and on your local device.
trans-unit.target: If your VPN device on your local network doesn't provide a shared key, you can make one up and input it here and on your local device.

trans-unit.source: The important thing is that they both match.
trans-unit.target: The important thing is that they both match.

trans-unit.source: The remaining values for **Subscription**, **Resource Group**, and **Location** are fixed.
trans-unit.target: The remaining values for **Subscription**, **Resource Group**, and **Location** are fixed.

trans-unit.source: You'll see *Creating Connection* flash on the screen.
trans-unit.target: You'll see *Creating Connection* flash on the screen.

trans-unit.source: When the connection is complete, you'll see it appear in the **Connections** blade for your Gateway.
trans-unit.target: When the connection is complete, you'll see it appear in the **Connections** blade for your Gateway.
